Articles.Content:
Blue Hawk Industries

Blue Hawk Industries is a mod pack for 1970's era weapons and is a finalized mod. It will no longer be added to, but will be maintained for functionality.

DROPBOX DOWNLOAD

  • Important Notes
    • The download comes with the required portions of North Kerbin Dynamics for the nuclear weapons to work. If you already have NKD installed in your game, then you do not need the one included with this download. It is there for people who want the nuclear weapons included in this mod to function but dont want the entire NKD mod.
    • The F-14 IVA looks much better with Rastor Prop Monitor Downloaded.
    • If you have a problem with the mod functioning, read the instructions that came with the download and ensure that you followed them. This will solve a lot of problems.
Edited September 14, 2017 by TMasterson5
update

I would love to see a R-3R missile frequently used by Mig 21s against the f4. Really it a reverse engineered Aim-9B so I understand if you don't want to redo the sidewinder.

Well it's actually the AN/SPS 59. But I do see what you're seeing now that I'm looking at it. Damnit....... Cannot unsee
Is it correct to assume that this mod requires BD Armory to be installed?

8 hours ago, politas said:

Is it correct to assume that this mod requires BD Armory to be installed?

It MIGHT still work without it installed but the parts with BD functions certainly won't work fully.

///UPDATE///

Version .2 is no up for download.

        Raised Aim-7's attach point to that it better matches the weapon mounts to the hardpoint
        Changed the F-14 cockpits model a bit to make the bottom not have as much of a noticible notch where the angle changes
        Messed with the arresting gears strength and deploy angle to make it catch more air more efficiently

.2 also added a 20mm ammo drum

Looking good...

the opening front area could have a sneaky Thermo-nuclear warhead from north kerbin dynamics

Just want to give you a heads up that I'm not able to access the downloads either, and neither can the Jenkins that CKAN runs. I opened an issue with spacedock to see if they can look into the matter: https://github.com/KSP-SpaceDock/SpaceDock/issues/153

Edited April 24, 2016 by plague006

Per an edited IRC convo in #spacedock:

[15:21] (@VITAS): needs to be uploaded again i think
[15:22] (@VITAS): also the image is missing
[15:22] (@VITAS): so my guess is: its in the db but doesnt exist as folder on the server

...
[15:26] (@VITAS): you can forward my tips for resolving this

----

I won't be pursuing the issue further as this isn't my battle, but I hope the info I provided helps.

Version 1.1 is now up with full confirmed 1.1 functionality. Also added is an afterburning engine based on the F-14's F-110 engines
Version .2.2 is up and now includes the agm-e-84-Harpoon missile.
Version .2.3 is now up and includes hull numbers 0-9, all tweakscalable.

A10 Warthog stuff maybe. Since the deployment year of the A10 Was 1976 Also a 10 Cockpit with a built in gun and maybe Paveway bombs aswell?

Edit: Also multiple MiG's and Sukhoi aircraft were deployed among them the SU-27 and MiG-31 Both of these look cool and have nearly the same weaponry

Blue Hawk Industries version .4 is out

Changelog:   

Version .4
        Added AN-AWW-7
        Added AIM-9-J-Sidewinder
        Added Minuteman III Nuclear MIRV
        Added Polaris Nuclear Missile
        Added Polaris Missile Tube(Should work for launches while clipped into other parts)
        Added Hound Dog Nuclear Cruise Missile
        Resized some parts

 

NOTE: The nuclear weapons REQUIRE North Kerbin Dynamics. Because of this included in the download is North Kerbin Dynamics
dependencies. If you already have NKD installed, you DO NOT need this one also. It is only there if you dont have
it and dont want to installl the whole mod.
